data.text: @RollingRoon // Yuuuush! The important is that you are always safe Roonie 💜💗 https://t.co/9BfSaqkMC4
@Indianshipgirl I will try my best to bring things back to its order.
@KaleeshWarlord //Thanks you Grieve. I wish the same to you my friend ~

@RollingRoon // Dont worry Roon-Chan! I just hope that everything can go well and that you too can find a peaceful life as soon as possible.
The important thing for all of us is to know that you are okay  💜🥺💜 https://t.co/XSejeg7JwM
@RollingRoon This sounds bad but i hope everthing better now.
@RollingRoon ///take some time for yourself no one is pressuring you to respond to anything I hope. Take care of yourself first ok
@RollingRoon I am doing fine, thanks. I really wish normal life comes back now... I really miss hanging out with friends and go to places
@RollingRoon I hope things get better soon ❤️‍🩹 https://t.co/T97fWG0KPc

@PartyUssSeattle Thanks you. I love you , hope you would be safe and doing good.
Looked back , having normal life is better than diving in golden river.

@RollingRoon That does sound really bad.. :/
Hope you get better soon. I wish you and your family the best.
